item.title: EPA Promotes Fertilizer Carrying PFAS, Long After 3M Shared Risks
item.description: The agency obtained research from 3M in 2003 revealing that sewage sludge, the raw material for the fertilizer, carried toxic “forever chemicals.”

item.title: 10 Years After Obama’s Opening to Cuba, Despair Replaces Hope

item.title: Elon Musk Needs to Teach Our Government How to Lose More Money
item.description: A better industrial policy for the United States involves more risk taking, not less.

item.title: Israeli Military Forces Patients and Staff to Leave Hospital in Northern Gaza
item.description: The hospital, Kamal Adwan, has been caught in the middle of Israel’s monthslong offensive against Hamas militants in northern Gaza.

item.title: Ukraine Slows Missile Fire Into Russia as Trump Prepares to Take Office
